text: Nabii Mucammadow åsa maryam Baxa Nabii Qiisâ caagidik woh Baxxaqissam ixxigak koh temeeteek lakal kay caagidil koo giddiya marak, toysa Ni-Xayloo kee sin xaylooy Ni-Agabuu kee sin Agabuh secnay, nanu ninni nafsih Namaatek isin sinni nafsih Ama, tohuk lakal Yallat xaaqimnaah, Nabii Qiisâ caagidil nee kee Siinik dirab yecee mara Ni-Rabbow isi Racmatak eyxer Axcenno keenik ixxic
